name: Cary Miller
text: Marcos has the unfortunate circumstance of being located across the street from what in my humble opinion is the best pizza in town, Monicals Pizza.  Marcos does serve up a pretty good pie with ample toppings.  The staff has always been â€¦More

name: Ricky Drowns
text: After an hour and a half we called Marcos, and apparently our pizza was already made an hour ago and 20 minutes away, I would not recommend this place unless you like cold pizza. We inevitably canceled the order and called Papa john's.

name: Amos A. Anderson
text: Marco's pizza has become a regular occurrence in our household. The pizza is pretty good and the prices are reasonable. If they make a mistake (once in 100 times we've ordered there) they go way out of their way to make it right. I highly recommend this place.

name: Patricia Martin
text: Good pizza and good service !

name: MATT ADAMS
text: Doing it again. LOVE this place. Just can't go wrong with this one. Atmosphere is great with awesome food on the river.

name: Daniel Leffler
text: pizzas dough always has a cardboard taste, why I don't know maybe someday management will fix ,even after pizza is cooked the dough needs help??

name: Clinton Allen
text: It was good maybe should've customized the order a little more but it was good nonetheless

name: Thomas Krylowicz
text: Their pizza is good and affordable.

name: Erik Pacelt
text: Good pizza  quality food great price  and amazing deals and coupons.  One of my top places to get food for my family at unbeatable price . Need a movie to go along with  meal they got it considering family video is right next store

name: Josh Graybill
text: Great staff and great food

name: GavatronX9
text:
Marco's pizza is good puzza, if you like your pizza a bit different.
Nor different bad, but different great!

name: Feebee5161
text: Food is tasty but service needs improvement.  Three times in a row they have screwed up my order.  I even ordered online once and they still did not get it right.  Hopefully it will get better since they just opened for business.

name: Amanda Reeves
text: Best pizza in town. Staff is always super friendly, wait times are never unreasonable, and the food is always perfectly done to order.

name: gwnfan
text: Good cheesy bread. Great deals connected to Family Video

name: Nathan Shock
text: I ordered a pizza from here and it was absolutely awful. The cheese was burnt and looked like someone pumped a load of chunder all over a soggy biscuit. The crust was as hard as a sailor in Thailand and despite the whole thing being cooked â€¦More
